title: Did Pelosi Decry Trump’s Police Tactics While Funding Them?
subtitle: Top Democrats were quick to criticize the president's "law and order" approach to policing on Twitter. But do their budget decisions say otherwise?
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi publicly criticized the actions of federal agents in U.S. cities during protests in 2020 — while simultaneously supporting a budget bill that would fund such law enforcement efforts.
